data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,520,601 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Colorado, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Colorado.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Colorado, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Colorado, United States.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mongolian, Peripheral people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Colorado
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,520,601 believers in Colorado and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Colorado, United States has a population of 5,758,500.

We estimate Colorado has 1,520,601 people who might know Jesus, 2,884,128 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,353,772 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 5,758,500 citizens of the the state of Colorado.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

location.name: Colorado
location.cities_list: Denver, Colorado Springs, Aurora, Fort Collins, Lakewood
location.cities_list_w_pop: Denver (715,522), Colorado Springs (456,568), Aurora (359,407), Fort Collins (161,175), Lakewood (152,597)
